name: Ricetta: involtini di carne ai matsutake
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Matsutake Meat Rolls.

value.name: Matsutake
value.desc: A rare fungus that generally grows on or near pine trees. Its delicate aroma gives away its location.

value.name: Pezzo di carne cruda
value.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

value.name: Involtini di carne ai matsutake
value.desc: A pan-fried meat dish. Ground meat is put on the Matsutake and gently pan-fried on low heat so the Matsutake can fully take in the aromatic juice of the meat. It's a mouthwatering delicacy in all of its glory.

value.text: Obtained during Archon Quest Chapter I: Act I "Custodian of Clouds"
